org.example.service

Interface ApplianceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplianceServiceImpl

    public interface ApplianceService
    Service, that contains methods for appliance interaction, using ApplianceDAO for XML file connectivity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Appliance find(Criteria criteria)
      Returns first appliance of appliances' list, that fit criteria params
      Appliances getAll()
      Returns all appliances, that file "goods.xml" contains
      java.util.List<Kettle> getAllKettles()
      Returns all kettles, that "goods.xml" file contains
      Appliance getTheCheepest()
      Returns the cheepest appliance, that "goods.xml" file contains
      void write(Appliances appliances)
      Write appliances instance to "goods.xml" file

    • Method Detail
